publicationsPage.title: Angular: 'Grundlagen, fortgeschrittene Themen und Best‚ÄØPractices ‚Äì ab Angular 10'
publicationsPage.description: This German Angular book will teach you how to develop modern apps for web and mobile. You will learn about the basic concepts of Angular, the best practices and related tools.

aboutPage.intro: My name is Danny Koppenhagen and  I am a passionate software developer and IT consultant. My profession is the development of web applications ‚Äì especially of single page applications (SPA). My technology stack includes mainly Angular, RxJS, NgRx but also Vue.js and NativeScript. Furthermore I develop Node.js backends based on JavaScript and TypeScript. I am an IT consultant for web-architectures and -frameworks. During the development I am very focussed on the user experience (UX).
aboutPage.meetup: I regularly visit the Angular Berlin Meetup and help with the organization of it. Interesting topics around Angular, RxJS, NgRx and other tools from the Angular eco-system are always presented at the Meetup.

blackCoffee.heading: #000000 c0ffee Tech-Talk by DB Systel
blackCoffee.text:
In May I was a guest at DB Systel's #000000 c0ffee tech talk, which took place remotely due to the global corona pandemic.
In the interview, I talk about my developer experience with Vue.js and Angular and about my opinion which framework is suitable for which application. I also talk about the current state of the art for Progressive Webapps (PWA). In the last part we talk about the connection of APIs and the architecture pattern "Backend For Frontends" (BFF).
blackCoffee.text2:
Im Mai war ich zu Gast beim #000000 c0ffee Tech-Talk der DB Systel, der Auf Grund der welteweiten Corona Pandemie remote stattfand.
Im Interview spreche ich √ºber meine Erfahrungen mit Vue.js und Angular und gehe darauf ein, welches Framework sich f√ºr welche Anwendungszwecke eignet. Au√üerdem erl√§utere ich, wie der aktuelle Stand der Technik f√ºr Progressive Webapps (PWA) ist. Im letzten Teil sprechen wir √ºber die Anbindung von APIs und √ºber das Architekturmuster "Backend For Frontends" (BFF).

agiledrop.heading: Interview with Agiledrop
agiledrop.text: In my interview with Agiledrop I talk about my personal way into the web development and about how I became co-author of the German 'Angular Buch'. Furthermore I talk about my practical experiences with Angular and Vue.js and in which cases I would choose Angular or Vue. Lust but not least I talk about the static site generator Scully, Webcomponents as well as my expectations for future changes within the web development.
